sentence.Network_en: He has received extensive corrective surgery to his skull.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的头骨做过大面积的矫形手术。

sentence.Network_en: It's a fair guess to say that the damage will be extensive.
sentence.Network_cn: 说损失会很严重想必猜得不错。

sentence.Network_en: The blast caused extensive damage, shattering the ground-floor windows.
sentence.Network_cn: 爆炸造成了巨大的破坏，震碎了一楼的窗户。

英语专业四级常用词汇汇总.doc - 豆丁网 ... extend 延伸,延长 extensive 广大的,广阔的 extent 程度,范围.
在拉丁美洲广泛游历 When built, the palace and its grounds were more extensive than the city itself. 建成时,宫殿及其庭园比城市本身面积还要大。.

list.abs: 叫扩展(extensions)比较合适，插件(plugins)虽然也属于外挂(Add-ons)，但是和扩展有差别。 目前我只装了5个扩展：Firebug, Web De…
分字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 分会〖 branchassociation〗 分机〖 extension〗 分级〖 classify;grade〗.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from French extensif, -ive or late Latin extensivus, from extens- 'stretched out', from the verb extendere (see extend)

entry.def: Something that is extensive covers or includes a large physical area.

example.ex: When built, the palace and its grounds were more extensive than the city itself.
example.tran: 建成时，宫殿及其庭园比城市本身面积还要大。

entry.tran: 广泛的;全面的;包罗万象的
entry.def: Something that is extensive covers a wide range of details, ideas, or items.

example.ex: Developments in South Africa receive extensive coverage in The Sunday Telegraph...
example.tran: 《星期日电讯报》全面报道了南非的发展。

example.ex: ...the extensive research into public attitudes to science...
example.tran: 针对公众科学观的广泛调查

entry.def: If something is extensive, it is very great.

example.ex: The blast caused extensive damage, shattering the ground-floor windows...
example.tran: 爆炸造成了巨大的破坏，震碎了一楼的窗户。

example.ex: The security forces have extensive powers of search and arrest...
example.tran: 安全部队拥有搜查和逮捕的至高权力。

means.word_mean: 1. large in spatial extent or range;

sentences.sentence: "an extensive Roman settlement in northwest England"

means.word_mean: 3. large in number or quantity (especially of discourse);
5. of agriculture; increasing productivity by using large areas with minimal outlay and labor;

auth_sentence.content: There is an extensive swampy lowland in the south.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is an extensive swampy lowland in the south.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is an extensive swampy lowland in the south.

auth_sentence.content: Successful candidates will receive competitive salary and extensive benefits.
auth_sentence.res_content: Successful candidates will receive competitive salary and extensive benefits.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Successful candidates will receive competitive salary and extensive benefits.

auth_sentence.content: There is also extensive data from Denmark and Sweden.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is also extensive data from Denmark and Sweden.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is also extensive data from Denmark and Sweden.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+tens伸展,趋向+ive……的→伸出去的→广大的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 强烈的,剧烈的;热烈的,热情的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in加强+tens伸展,趋向+e→拉紧→强烈的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 强烈的, 精深的, 透彻的
stems_affixes.word_buile: intense[adj.强烈的,剧烈的;热烈的,热情的]+ive表形容词→adj.强烈的, 精深的, 透彻的
tens伸展,趋向+e→adj.紧张的, 拉紧的 v.[使]紧张,[使]拉紧
tens伸展,趋向+ible能……的→adj.可伸长的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可拉长的, 可伸长的
stems_affixes.word_buile: tens伸展,趋向+ile表形容词→adj.可拉长的, 可伸长的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 延长;扩大;范围;大小;尺寸;电话分机
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+tens伸展,趋向+ion表名词→伸出去→扩张

stems_affixes.value_cn: 强烈, 剧烈, 强度;亮度
stems_affixes.word_buile: intense[adj.强烈的,剧烈的;热烈的,热情的]+ity表名词→n.强烈, 剧烈, 强度;亮度
pre前+tens伸展,趋向+ion表名词→提前摆出一种姿态→自负
tens伸展,趋向+ion表名词→伸展出的状态→紧张
tens伸展,趋向+ity表名词→n.紧张, 紧张度

stems_affixes.value_cn: 加强; 变强; 加剧
stems_affixes.word_buile: intense[adj.强烈的,剧烈的;热烈的,热情的]+ify……化→v.加强; 变强; 加剧
tens伸展,趋向+e→adj.紧张的, 拉紧的 v.[使]紧张,[使]拉紧

Sentence.sentence: The challenge is that an increase in animal-based production will require more land and resources, as livestock (牲畜)farming demands extensive land use.
The media, including this newspaper, are giving the subject extensive coverage.

means.word_mean: 广阔的, 广大的, 大量的;  广泛的, 大规模的, 广博的

sentences.cn: 这栋房子有广阔的空地。

jushi.english: He possesses an extensive knowledge of banking.
jushi.chinese: 他具有广博的银行业务知识。

jushi.english: We're having extensive repairs done to the building.
jushi.chinese: 我们正大面积翻修这栋房子。

jushi.english: In English study, intensive reading must be combined with extensive reading.
jushi.chinese: 在英语学习中,精读必须与泛读结合起来。
